overview: No one appreciates Women of Color more than Anabolic. How do we keep finding these Titillating, Tumultuous, Tawdry Tarts? Few possess a passion for ethnicity like we do; consequently, you (our dedicated fans) are not inflicted with boring, plain-wrapped, vanilla, white bread crackers, but get to reap the benefits of viewing truly beautiful erotic honeys! Anabolic proudly presents Women of Color #12, where we continue to bring you the erotic ethnic flava of romance.
tagline: Over 3 Hours of 6 Erotic Exotic Beauties
title: Women of Color 12
